items.typeLine: Abecedarian's Ruby Flask of the Order
craftedMods: 50% Chance to Avoid being Stunned during Effect

items.name: The Primordial Chain
explicitMods: +3 to maximum number of Summoned Golems
flavourText: The leash of the lifegiver
binds in both directions.

items.name: Void Battery
explicitMods: 25% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
flavourText: "The trick is to give nothingness,
and to receive everything in return."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range
Projectiles from Supported Skills have 4.8 metres maximum range
Supported Skills have 40% less Area of Effect
Supported Skills Deal 60% more Damage with Hits against Branded Enemy
Supported Skills are Triggered by Arcanist Brand, from the Brand's location
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

properties.name: Fire, Lightning, Spell, AoE, Duration, Physical

socketedItems.secDescrText: An expanding wave of energy surges forward, damaging enemies in a cone-shaped area over a duration. Each enemy hit is inflicted with Exposure matching the element of which they took the highest damage. Only one Wave of Conviction can be active at a time
explicitMods: 25% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
20% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Exposure applies -15% to Elemental Resistance matching highest Damage taken
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -30% to Elemental Resistances
10% increased Duration of Elemental Ailments on Cursed enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Heatshiver
enchantMods: 150% increased Effect of the Buff granted by your Stone Golems
implicitMods: 0.5% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life
explicitMods: Gain 1% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1% Chill Effect on Enemy
Gain 100% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Give of your heated passions.
Give of your cold resolve.
You will be repaid.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a sudden burst of cold in a targeted area, damaging enemies. This also creates an expanding area which is filled with chilled ground, and deals cold damage over time to enemies. Enemies that die while in the area have a chance to grant Frenzy Charges. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Frenzy Charge.
explicitMods: Deals 1895.4 Base Cold Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when an Enemy Dies while in this Skill's Area
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Deals 2454.5 Base Cold Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
Modifiers to Skill Effect Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention

Gain a Frenzy Charge when an Enemy Dies while in this Skill's Area
Every second, gain a Frenzy Charge if an Enemy is in this Skill's Area
hybrid.secDescrText: Creates a sudden burst of cold around you, damaging enemies. This also creates a chilling area around you which expands and deals cold damage over time to surrounding enemies in addition to chilling them. Enemies that die while in the area grant Frenzy Charges, and you will passively gain Frenzy Charges while there are enemies in the area.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that can chill enemies or create chilling areas.
explicitMods: 55% increased Effect of Chill inflicted with Supported Skills
Enemies Chilled by Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect
Enemies in Chilling Areas from Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect
Supported Skills deal 15% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.

socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.
explicitMods: Deals 2805.1 Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Life as Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Energy Shield as Base Fire Damage per second
You Burn for 90% of your Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
You Burn for 70% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods:
Sacrifices 60% of your total Energy Shield and Life

hybrid.secDescrText: Sacrifices a portion of your Life and Energy Shield to engulf you in magical fire that rapidly burns nearby enemies for a duration. Your spell damage is increased while under this effect.

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Doryani's Delusion
enchantMods: Damage Penetrates 10% of Enemy Elemental Resistances if you haven't Killed Recently
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
explicitMods: Grants Level 25 Purity of Lightning Skill
Adds 2 to 69 Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
flavourText: "Every day we choose safety or knowledge.
Live and stagnate, or risk death for truth.
I would rather see the end of the Vaal
than help it tread water."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 40% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 75% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants fire resistance to you and your allies.

Your and nearby Allies' Damage Penetrates 1% Fire Resistance

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Stone Golem that grants you life regeneration. In addition to its melee attack, the Stone Golem uses a rolling charge and a powerful slam that can taunt enemies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Flame Golem that grants you increased Damage. The Flame Golem can use a fire spray, a wave of fire damage, and an explosive arcing projectile.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Chaos Golem that grants you Physical Damage Reduction. The Chaos Golem can use a damage over time Chaos aura and a cascade of Chaos spikes in addition to its melee attack.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Lightning Golem that grants you increased Attack and Cast speed. socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage.
